entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , Collingwood
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 6:41 PM EST Tuesday 24 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -0.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Collingwood 8:00 PM EST Tuesday 24 January 2023
Temperature: -0.3°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.3 kPa rising
Humidity: 84 %
Wind Chill: -1
Dewpoint: -2.6°C
Wind: SSE 3 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Tuesday night: Flurries. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Flurries ending near midnight then partly cloudy. Local amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 6 this evening and minus 11 overnight. Forecast issued 6:10 PM EST Tuesday 24 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Snow. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy in the morning. Snow beginning near noon. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h late in the afternoon. High minus 3. Wind chill near minus 11. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 6:10 PM EST Tuesday 24 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow. Low minus 6.
